channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiAuthenticator OutlookAgent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiAuthenticator OutlookAgent

item.title: CVE-2022-22304|2024-08-03T03:07:50.215Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiauthenticator%20outlookagent
item.description: An improper neutralization of input during web page generation vulnerability [CWE-79] in FortiAuthenticator OWA Agent for Microsoft version 2.2 and 2.1 may allow an unauthenticated attacker to perform an XSS attack via crafted HTTP GET requests.
